thread.title: Linking renewable power projects to grid a problem - S.African official
thread.title_full: Linking renewable power projects to grid a problem - S.African official | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Linking renewable power projects to grid a problem - S.African official
text:
PRETORIA Aug 31 South Africa is finding it tough to connect its growing number of renewable power projects to the national grid at a time when state-owned utility Eskom facing a power crisis that is hurting economic growth.
"Connections are a problem, we have all identified that, including Eskom," head of Independent Power Producers unit Karen Breytenbach told a news conference. (Reporting by Peroshni Govender ; Writing by TJ Strydom; Editing by James Macharia)
